Pre-Game Insights: New Zealand look to make it 3/3 in Chennai amid their captain's big return
Bangladesh meanwhile will need to change their tactics as they look to recover from their heavy defeat against England
The big news for New Zealand is the return of their regular captain, Kane Williamson, who is returning after a seven-month injury break
Miscellaneous Highlights: New Zealand have a chance to win their first three matches of a World Cup for the third consecutive edition
